named-query.name: BpJpaEdge_getEdgesByKey
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM BpJpaEdge e join e.propMap m where m.keyName = :keyName

named-query.name: BpJpaEdge_getEdgeById
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM BpJpaEdge e where e.id = :id

named-query.name: BpJpaEdge_getEdgesByLabel
named-query.query: SELECT e FROM BpJpaEdge e where e.label = :label
